name: Yoga with Sisters & Misters
description:
Yoga - With the Sisters and Misters
PLEASE BRING YOUR OWN MATS :))
Progressive Vinyasa classes with Chanchal are a blend of breath work, strong but approachable flow, mindful postural focus, and deep soothing support.
Classes cultivate balance, stability, flexibility, mobility and vigor as the asana ebbs and flows between effort and ease.
Students can expect a mix of both traditional lineage based practices & progressive movement intended for modern bodies and demands.
Yoga Instructor: Chanchal
Meeting time: 8:15 
Meeting Point: CCD Square
For any further queries contact
Vaishnavi- 6380349608

name: Visible Mending 101
description:
You can bring something you’d like to mend, or practice on fabric scraps as we explore simple techniques like darning, and patchwork.

Visible mending shows that repairing is not just practical, but beautiful. It's a way to care for our clothes, extend their life, and add a touch of personality and colour along the way.

All materials will be provided, but feel free to bring your own garment to work on.

name: Desi Breakfast Club
description:
From the deep, masala-laden bite of Bedmi Poori to the indulgent fluff of Chole Bhature, every plate is a page from a desi breakfast diary.

Craving something richer? Keema Pav brings the heat. And the Parathas? Stuffed, griddled, and made exactly the way they should be — with love, ghee, and no shortcuts.

This isn’t a meal. It’s a morning well spent.

Now Serving Desi Breakfast only at Treat.
Every Sunday 09:30 am - 11:30 am

PLEASE NOTE: We have two time slots available for the Desi Breakfast Club:

Slot 1 - 09:30 AM - 10:15 AM
Slot 2 - 10:30 AM - 11:15 AM

- Once you send in your reservation request, our team will get in touch to confirm your preferred timing. If your chosen slot is full, we’ll happily offer you the next available one.

- To reserve your spot, we’re charging a small fee of ₹200 per person—which is fully redeemable against your meal. You’re free to choose anything from the menu, and if your bill goes over, you can simply settle the difference at the restaurant.

Can’t wait to see you at the Desi Breakfast Club ☀️

name: Yoga + sound bowl experience at the Van Gogh Immersive exhibition
description:
Yoga + Guided Breathing + Sound Bowls + Journaling… in an art masterpiece. 🎨✨

You don’t want to miss this one-of-a-kind experience happening right here in Bangalore!

And the best part : you will get your own Wiselife yoga mat at the event !!

Date: 23rd August (Saturday)

Time: 8:30 am

Location: The Van Gogh Immersive Exhibition, Bhartiya Mall of Bangalore

Movement, mindfulness, and creativity — all surrounded by the magic of Van Gogh’s art.

location.name: Bhartiya Mall Of Bengaluru, Thanisandra
location.address: Bhartiya Mall Of Bengaluru, Thanisandra, Bangalore

name: A Cupcake Baking & Icing Experience
description: Indulge your sweet tooth with A Mini Indulgence. This cupcake baking and icing experience provides a delightful opportunity to learn the art of creating beautiful and delicious cupcakes.

location.name: Magnolia Bakery, St. Mark's Rd
location.address: Magnolia Bakery, St. Mark's Rd, Bangalore

name: Interpreting Contemporary Indian Art
description: Gain insights into contemporary Indian art through this event, which may involve lectures, discussions, or workshops. Learn to analyze and understand modern artistic expressions.

name: Memory Box
description: Join Bangalore Creative Circus for MEMORY BOX. Further details about the event's nature and content are not provided in this source.

location.name: Bangalore Creative Circus, Yeshwanthpur Suburbs
location.address: Bangalore Creative Circus, Yeshwanthpur Suburbs, Bangalore

name: The Secret World of Magic
description: Explore the captivating world of magic with this beginner-friendly experience. Learn basic techniques, from card manipulation to coin vanishes, and delve into the psychology behind magic's illusions. Discover the history and evolution of magic, and understand its significance in today's world. Participants will practice magic in small groups under the guidance of a professional magician, Waseem, also known as The Modern Wizard, who has performed internationally and for high-profile events.

name: Sip And Stretch' With Local Ferment Co.
description: The event features a relaxing session of sipping and stretching, guided by Local Ferment Co, Gowri, and Mani. Participants will enjoy a blend of wellness and yoga, focusing on mental health and relaxation through kombucha-infused experiences.

location.name: Beka - Cafe Bakery Bookstore, JP Nagar
location.address: Beka - Cafe Bakery Bookstore, JP Nagar, Bangalore

name: The Living Textile Calendar of India
description: RITU RAAG: The Living Textile Calendar of India showcases six seasons, six moods, and six ragas. It brings Chandra Jain’s Ritu Samhar to life through Prasad Bidapa’s celebration of handwoven Banarasi brocades dyed in natural colors. From Basant’s first blossoms to Shishir’s winter farewell, sarees, music, and light weave together a living calendar—stories of nature, tradition, and artistry carried in every thread.

name: The ISRO & Mr. Umashankar Manthravadi
description: The Indian Sonic Research Organisation (ISRO) collective, known for their experimental sound explorations through DIY electronics and custom instruments, presents a community event featuring poet and mic-maker Umashankar Manthravadi. Manthravadi will perform his poetry using his self-built Brahma ambisonic microphones, instruments used by artists across various genres. The event fosters dialogue, invention, and experimentation within the community.

name: Amol Parashar: Live
description: Amol Parashar presents a live performance of BESHARAM AADMI, a show written by Vijay Ashok Sharma and directed by Vijay Ashok Sharma. The production is also produced by Amol Parashar and Vyom Charaya.

name: Food, Foraging, and the Fabric of Social Insects
description: Sruthi Unnikrishnan will be presenting a public lecture discussing the intricate relationship between food, foraging habits, and the social structure of insects. This event promises to delve into the nuances of how these small creatures organize themselves in relation to their resources, offering insights into the broader implications of social behavior in nature.

name: African Diaspora Sounds
description: FLYPSHIP, Afro Afro Social, and Social present African Diaspora Sounds – Social Sunday Sundowner, featuring Karun Mahtani's Afro Disco set. Expect electrifying Afro-diasporic music, vibrant energy, and community vibes. The event includes a guest list registration (closing at 6:15 PM), with cover charges applicable afterward (fully redeemable for food and drinks). Entry is for ages 21 and above, with valid ID required.

name: Basavanagudi Darshan
description: Explore the rich heritage of Basavanagudi on a curated walking tour. Discover the cultural significance and historical landmarks of this Bengaluru neighborhood.
